title: ‘You Want to Make Everything Count’: Renewed Sam Bennett Racing the Clock at Tour de France
content:
‘My sprint is still good enough to win’: 33-year-old speedster returns to the Tour wiser, stronger, and chasing his 2020 prowess.

Read the full article at ‘You Want to Make Everything Count’: Renewed Sam Bennett Racing the Clock at Tour de France on Velo.
author: sstokes
